greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. A(x) satisfies: 2^n + 1 = Sum_{k=0..n} [x^k] A(x)^n for n>=1.
formula: G.f. satisfies: (2+z)^n + (1+z)^n - z^n = Sum_{k=0..n} [x^k] (A(x)+z*x)^n for all z, where [x^k] F(x) denotes the coefficient of x^k in F(x).
Given g.f. A(x), then B(x)=A(x)-1-x series reversion is -B(-x). - _Michael Somos_, Sep 07 2005
Given g.f. A(x) and C(x) = g.f. of A025225, then B(x)=A(x)-1-x satisfies B(x)=x-C(x*B(x)). - _Michael Somos_, Sep 07 2005
